detail_desc: Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with narrow, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Short, off-the-shoulder smocked top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wrapover front and back and short sleeves.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Covered elastication at the waist, a high slit at the front and an overlocked hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Covered elastication at the waist, a high slit at the front and an overlocked hem.
Set with earrings and a bracelet in hammered metal. Round earrings, diameter 9 cm. Spiral-shaped bracelet, width approx. 8 cm.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with short fringes along the sides.
Short, high-waisted skirt in grained imitation leather with pleats at the top, a zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in organic cotton. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Pattern-weave dungarees with pockets, straps that cross at the back with decorative buttons and fasten with buttons at the front, and elastication at the waist and hems. Lined.
Vest top in soft, printed jersey with an asymmetric hem.
Vest top in soft, printed jersey with an asymmetric hem.
Thin metal hoop earrings with a pendant. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Thin metal hoop earrings with a pendant. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Metal earrings with a hoop and coin-shaped plastic pendant. Length 5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned jersey with narrow, braided shoulder straps, a wide flounced layer at the top and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned jersey with narrow, braided shoulder straps, a wide flounced layer at the top and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Length 5.5 cm.
Metal rings in various designs.
Metal rings in various designs.
Metal jewellery set with two pairs of studs, two pairs of earrings and six rings.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a round, picot-trimmed neckline, lapped shoulders, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with frills down the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, and side pockets.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Dress in soft, patterned jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Dress in soft, patterned jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Earrings in textured metal with a heart-shaped pendant. Length 4.5 cm.
Denim jacket with sleeves and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs.
Denim jacket with sleeves and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs.
Denim jacket with sleeves and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slightly lower crotch. Relaxed fit over the bum and thighs with tapered legs from the knees down.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Fully lined, halterneck swimsuit with laser-cut scalloped edges. Triangular cups with removable inserts, ties at the top and gathers in the sides for a comfortable fit over the tummy. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyamide.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims down the sides and at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem with overlocked edges.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem with overlocked edges.
Wide poncho top in soft, printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Wide poncho top in soft, printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Wide poncho top in soft, printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Wide poncho top in soft, printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Short dress in an airy linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Non-wired nursing bras in soft microfibre with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Non-wired nursing bras in soft microfibre with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

One-shoulder jumpsuit in woven fabric with a draped detail at the top and one long puff sleeve with a defined, gathered shoulder. Concealed silicone trim at the top to keep the jumpsuit in place and a concealed zip with a hook-and-eye fastener in one side. Seam at the waist with pleats to create volume at the top, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a grandad collar, classic front, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No fasteners. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No fasteners. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and buttoning at the front. Fake pocket with a decorative handkerchief at the top and fake flap pockets at the front. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Tapered legs with gathers and a zip at the hems.
